Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good for you.
<PAGE>
I can't believe it. Have you been
collecting bugs from morning to night?
You've got too much time on your hands.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your victory.
Just what I expected from my princess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But keep in mind that later
I'll have to punish you for
spending our date time collecting bugs.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
Haven't you spent all the time with me
collecting bugs?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I was thinking
what the punishment should have been
if you're results where bad.
<PAGE>
Well, I'll forgive you, since you
have good results. You're going to make
our time together a first priority.
<PAGE>
This is an order.
You got that? <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
It is a pity we couldn't win
but I guess that's just life.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I cannot believe that you and I
were defeated. The people of this town
are pretty good.
<PAGE>
Anyway, we may have lost this time
but that doesn't mean that we'll lose
ext time. Let's do our best next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Though personally,
I'm not really into collecting bugs...
<PAGE>
I'd rather see my princess
laughing or crying 
after winning or losing.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm trying to comfort you,
but you seem to be happy
even though we lost.
<PAGE>
... What? You're happy
cause we were able to join in together?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Oh...my princess. You always come
out with things like that...
I don't know what to do with you.
<PAGE>
There's no way
I can reward you now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>OK... We lost at the contest
but still I will reward you once we
get back home. Expect something good.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I tried as hard as I could
to collect bugs...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>It was amazing to see
those people who could focus
on collecting bugs.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I be leave that you should try
if you decided to do something but,
I always get fed up. What can I do?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Collecting bugs
demands more time and physical strength
than you'd imagine.
<PAGE>
If you go collecting bugs in your free
time, you can see how fast time
passes. It is amazing.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win, <MYNAME>!
You caught a lot of bugs.
Very impressive!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, Congratulations!
I am so happy 
that you won!
<PAGE>
You really are too good 
to be my girlfriend.
I'm really proud of you!
<PAGE>
Next time I will win,
so you can be proud
that I'm your boyfriend!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win, <MYNAME>!
You really are amazing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Even after marriage,
my love for you
just keeps growing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's celebrate together when we
get home! Since today is special,
how about I treat you dinner tonight?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah! It was so much fun♪
Victory feels
so good♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hi, <MYNAME>!
I won!
Even I can't believe it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I hope this makes you
think more of me,
even just a little...I wonder why!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Heh heh heh, I won!
It's partially thanks to
your support!
<PAGE>
Thank you!
It would be wonderful if you could
win next time.
<PAGE>
My dream is to achieve a husband-wife
double victory with you!
If we could, I would be twice happy♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was a pity.
Let's try harder,
so we can win next time!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was a pity what happened today but
I'm sure you'll win next time!
I can guarantee it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But then
if you win, that'll mean
I won't be able to win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, yeah! A double victory of me and you
would be great♪
It really would!
<PAGE>
 It's settled! Next time I'll try hard
to achieve a double victory together
with you! Good luck to you too!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, it was too bad this time.
Forget about this when we get home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's spend some time together eating
delicious food and chatting. You'll
see how quickly your mood disappears♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I realized something while I was
collecting bugs. Maybe each of the
bugs has a favorite spot!
<PAGE>
When they escaped,
I stayed in the same place for some time
and after a while, they came back again.
<PAGE>
Maybe it is just my impression...
but humans are the same. Humans also
often gather at a same places.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm sure it must be 
the same for bugs.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Playing with cats or dogs
is a good exercise, collecting insects
was also a good exercise.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>As a result, I feel a little muscle pain
in my arms.
<PAGE>
Hmm, maybe I should
strengthen the muscles of 
all my body a little more.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>My body isn't the type that
can develop muscles easily. Even though
I would like to look more masculine.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. I'm impressed
at the number of bugs you caught.
Very impressive, really.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your win, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You really put in a lot of effort.
So I suppose this feels like the
reward to those efforts, right?
<PAGE>
I must say I'm very
very happy for you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congratulations on your win.
All those days you spent collecting bugs
were worth the effort.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>The only sad thing is you didn't
pay any attention to me for 3 days.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, then again I like watching
you work hard, so it's alright.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I lost! Such activities
are not suitable for people this age.
<PAGE>
You're so strong;
not like me. Just keep on trying your
best I am sure you'll win next time.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
We both lost. Never mind.
It can't be helped if somebody
collected more bugs than we did.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I thought you might be
able to win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Huh?
I'm not overestimating you.
<MYNAME>, you're so humble.
<PAGE>
That's what I like so much
about you.
...Haha, are you embarrassed?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Perfect husband-wife double defeat. It
was a pity, there's always a next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>After we get back home, I'm thinking
of preparing our favorite
foods to help us forget this.
<PAGE>
Hey, your eyes have lit up.
Weren't you just feeling down?
Oh well, that's the <MYNAME> I know!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I collected bugs for the first time
in so long. It was quite fun.
<PAGE>
Collecting bugs as an adult
has a special joy different
from when I did it in my childhood.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This event just has everybody
in town running around collecting bugs.
I can't see the point.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But still,
maybe once a year is fine.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If it was more often than that, I
wouldn't be able to take it. Even now,
I look good but my muscles are aching.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win.
Only you could catch
so many bugs like that.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win.
The passion you put into catching bugs,
is just stunning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know you had been
catching bugs a lot...
but this is just amazing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Now I think about it, I'm so proud
to be the boyfriend of someone
who tries so hard at whatever they do.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>,
Congratulations on your win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You've been doing a lot of running
around these days. You must be tired?
<PAGE>
When you get back home, I'll make you a
special blend of tea that will
alleviate all of your tiredness...
<PAGE>
Tonight you can drink that
and have a nice rest.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad we both lost.
At least there's always next time.
<PAGE>
Please don't
feel discouraged.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad we both lost.
This time I realized how difficult
collecting bugs is.
<PAGE>
What? You want to go collecting bugs 
as a date? 
I'm honored but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>No no! I'm not refusing! I'm
happy to spend some time with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>OK, I understand. I can't refuse the
request of the person I love so much.
<PAGE>
I'll show you that I can even overcome
my insect phobia for you.
Just...give me...some time please.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good try, <MYNAME>.
What a pity for both of us this time.
<PAGE>
Not me,
but I thought you
had the skills to win....
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Perhaps you couldn't spend much
time collecting bugs since you put the
time with me at a higher priority...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Wh...Why thank you...
I appreciate your feelings,
but I don't want to get in your way.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Next time,
don't mind about me, and
put all your efforts in to the festival.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What kind of person is
Dunhill?
<PAGE>
One day I ran into him while he was
collecting bugs and his movements were
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>How can I say? His movements were
certainly not those of an amateur.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I've heard that Dunhill has experience
in many different jobs. He also must
have a lot of bug-related experience.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I saw Prince Amir collecting
bugs for the first time in ages.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Even though
he used to keep a distance from
this kind of fun since he grew up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I was reassured
to see him
having so much fun today.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was surprising.
You caught so many bugs. Maybe you
have a talent for catching bugs.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>... What? Your not happy to have
talent? I can understand that. I guess
it's not necessary for a farm owner.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on your win!
I thought I saw busy
running about recently.
<PAGE>
I can imagine that's what it takes
to catch so many bugs.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Huh? I-I wasn't following you
around everywhere!
<PAGE>
It's just because you were
moving around me so much!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good on you for winning.
I thought you weren't at home as much,
during the festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It's amazing that you can
catch so many. Don't overdo it, when I'm
not around.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>OK. I'm so glad you won though.
Let's celebrate when we get back home.
Hurry up, let's go home.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder how many hours a day
the champion has been catching bugs.
In a way, I admire it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was too bad this time.
But don't look so down.
I didn't win either.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Ah...maybe we could go somewhere
to cheer ourselves up. Although if
you're busy, I perfectly understand.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Huh? A date?
Wh-wh-what are you saying!
That's wasn't my intention!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Um, well,
if you prefer a date,
then I'm fine with that too.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not so easy to win, is it?
Anyway, there's always another chance.
So don't feel discouraged.
<PAGE>
After we get back home, how about I
make lots of your favorite food
and we forget about all this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Ha ha, you're looking better already!
Is your stomach rumbling? We need not to
worry if you have all that energy left.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ahhh,
I haven't moved so much in a long tine
except for looking after my animals.
<PAGE>
When it's been this long,
collecting bugs takes
a surprisingly large amount of energy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But anyway,
it was all great fun.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never normally paid much attention but
there are different kinds of bugs
in different places.
<PAGE>
I'd like to take some back home and
found myself taking them from here and
there without even realizing it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I was confident about the contest
but compared to you, I was nowhere near
good enough

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congrats on your win. 
It's amazing how you could catch
so many bugs like that.
<PAGE>
To be honest, I'm a bit
frustrated about losing but if you
were my opponent, it was inevitable.
<PAGE>
How about we go catch bugs together?
I would like you to teach me the latest
tricks for catching bugs. Could you?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
All those days you spent collecting bugs
were worth it.
<PAGE>
I saw how hard you worked
and I tried my best to compete with you
but I just couldn't get the win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll lose my prestige
both as a man and as a husband
if I keep losing....
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Next time, I will definitely win
against you. Be prepared for it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've never won anything
like this before.
I'm really happy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy I won, but
I can't believe it. 
It's all thanks to you.
<PAGE>
I've always seen you give 100%
at everything you do...
<PAGE>
That's way I practiced so hard.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy that I won.
Now I hope that you can be
proud of me as a husband.
<PAGE>
It's not easy being
the husband of someone
as amazing as you.
<PAGE>
I enjoy having to work so hard
to compete with you.
It's a great challenge.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I can't believe
we needed to catch so many insects
to win the contest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>The result wasn't good
for either of us this time but let's do
everything we can to win next time.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The result wasn't good
for either of us this time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But I feel sadder
seeing you so unhappy
than because I lost.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Catching bugs involves some luck, so
maybe you were just unlucky this time.
<PAGE>
So cheer up.
There's always next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Come one...
where's that smile I love so much.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We both lost but there's always next
time. Let's learn from the mistakes we
made this time and try hard next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Before that,
let's go home,
eat something good, talk and relax.
<PAGE>
We were so busy catching bugs so
we didn't have time to
 talk much, right?
<PAGE>
It's important and
fun to put all our efforts
into a town event...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But there is nothing
that can replace
the time with you .

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Catching bugs took me back
to when I was a child. 
<PAGE>
There were some bugs I couldn't reach
back then but now I can
reach almost all of them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I really felt that
I'd grown up when
I noticed the length of my arms.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now I just hope my personality
can grow to match my body.
One day...

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I just love looking at
all the different colors
of butterflies' wings.
<PAGE>
While I was catching bugs
I saw a butterfly with wing colors
that I'd never seen before.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>It flew away while
I was staring at it

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulation for winning!
I'm surprised at the
number of bugs out there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's amazing you could catch
so many of them, <MYNAME>! Next time,
I'm going to try hard too!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! I wouldn't expect
anything less from you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>How did you catch
so many bugs?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I guess you know the
secret places where
there are lots of bugs!
<PAGE>
If so, I hope you
can take me there with you
next time♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>!
That's what I was
expecting from my husband♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Just kidding.
Saying it out loud,
it's kind of embarrassing!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yeah, I won!
I'm so happy♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But now that I've won,
does that mean I have to write contest
article about me winning?
<PAGE>
Hmm...
It makes me feel a little awkward...

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I won!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Did that remind you why you love
me so much? It did?
Well well well! Really?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I was just kidding.
But I can't believe it. What a
surprise!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I won!
I' m so happy♪ It makes all
my hard work catching bugs worth it.
<PAGE>
You know what's next. I have to conduct
an interview with the family of winner!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Dear <MYNAME>,
what are your thoughts about
Tina's glorious victory?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm just kidding!
I'm a bit shy. Forget I asked!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It was a pity.
It really is hard to win.
It would be nice to win next time.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well, <MYNAME>.
We were unlucky this time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But the bigger the challenge,
the more worthwhile it is.
Instead, I'm getting excited!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm definitely going to win next time!
Let's get a double win!
You and I together♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I can't believe
neither of us won!
<PAGE>
We both worked so hard
to prepare for the contest.
Such a shame...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Now I feel like stuffing my face !
We can drown our sorrows
in lots of delicious food.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Catching insects was great fun♪
I love watching events
where other people participate.
<PAGE>
But I prefer taking part myself
and getting the chance 
to move around!
<PAGE>
I can't wait until next year♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
While watching the townspeople catching
critters, I think things like, "Oh,
they're not very good with critters."
<PAGE>
Or "That person's great at catching
criters!"
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Watching people is great.
It is such fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Although looking around constantly keeps
my eyes pretty busy. I hope my eyes
don't get strained.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>.
Where did you find all those bugs?
<PAGE>
I was amazed
when I heard how many you'd caught!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
congratulations!
<PAGE>
I bet you're great at
catching those annoying insects
that you find at home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I just love a reliable man♪
That's why I love
you so much. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
You're great!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Although hasn't being
preoccupied with bugs meant that
you've neglected me just a little? 
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If you neglect me again, maybe someone
else will come along and sweep me off my
feet. Be careful. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's a shame that neither
of us could win this time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>We all have good days and bad days.
So try not to be too sad.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a shame you didn't win.
But I'm glad that you didn't
get hurt during the contest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You sometimes go to
dangerous places without
really thinking about it, don't you? 
<PAGE>
I was worried that you
might wander off to catch bugs
and end up getting hurt.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You really worked hard.
You may have lost this time
but there's always next time.
<PAGE>
I know a way to
cheer you up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Tonight, I'll make lots
of your favorite food
and you can forget about all this.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone was so good at collecting bugs.
I wonder if they had all
trained for this competition.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I tried my best but
I couldn't catch as much as them.
I've still got some way to go.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have taken a break from
practicing magic since the contest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Since the results have been announced,
I'll get back to working hard
to practice my magic today♪
<PAGE>
Rest is important but
too much of it is a bad thing.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your victory.
Bugs... So many... Amazing.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I lost...
I feel...a bit frustrated...about it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But...you were my competitor...
so it's...only natural.
Congratulations on your win.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I lost... I feel a little...bad
about it...but you won...
I'm happy for you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I won... I still can't...believe it... 
I'm so...happy...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm so happy...that I won...
But...are you sad...
that you didn't win?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I'm unhappy that...you are sad...
But I'm...happy I won...
Such a...complicated feeling...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
My mum said that...
you will like me more...
if I win...
<PAGE>
I won...
Does that mean...
you like me more?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>... That makes me...happy...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's a shame...I didn't win...
It's a shame you didn't either...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I wasn't able...to win...
I tried so hard... I'm so sad...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But...you didn't
win either...
We're in it...together...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>... But is that...a good thing...
or a bad thing?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry... you didn't win...
I want to win...next time...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I would be...so happy if...
I could win...with you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The Critter Fest...was fun...
Everyone caught...so many bugs...
